db:abstract.db:para: [var-used-before-declaration] A JavaScript variable was used before its declaration.

db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [var-used-before-declaration] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: Variable is used here before its declaration
What happened?
db:section.db:para: You used a variable before you declared it.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: This makes the code harder to read. Variables declared with let or const will error out at runtime.
